Room.Name: Main Hallway
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along the Main Hallway inside the Temple of the Rising Moon.
Room.LongDescription: The hallway turns to the west, heading towards a large room a bit further to the west. The hall heads towards the entrance of the Temple to the southeast. The walls are covered with portraits of Artemis in various locations in the wilderness. Artemis is the goddess of the hunt and provides strength and courage against enemies of greater power.
